mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_CUST_PERMIT( XKZHM, KHMC, GBBM, GSID, GSMC, BMID, RWLX, JYDZ, FR, LXDH, XB, NL, SFZ, YYZZ, FRCSNY, SLRQ, YXRQ, GHDW, JYFW, JYXZ, JYYT, ZL, BZRQ, GXRQ, NSRQ, BZ, ZYJY, YCXT, XTNXS, ZZRQ0, ZZRQ1, XZFQ, ZT, EXT_COL1, EXT_COL2, EXT_COL3, EXT_COL4, EXT_COL5, EXT_COL6, EXT_COL7, EXT_COL8, EXT_COL9, EXT_COL10 ) VALUES ( #{xkzhm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwlx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyzz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frcsny, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ghdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyfw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyxz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyyt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gxrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nsrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zyjy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xtnxs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzrq0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzrq1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzfq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext_col10, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MD_CUST_PERMIT SET XKZHM = #{xkzhm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KHMC = #{khmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBBM = #{gbbm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GSID = #{gsid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GSMC = #{gsmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMID = #{bmid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RWLX = #{rwlx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYDZ = #{jydz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FR = #{fr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDH = #{lxdh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = #{xb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NL = #{nl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFZ = #{sfz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYZZ = #{yyzz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRCSNY = #{frcsny, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLRQ = #{slrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXRQ = #{yxrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GHDW = #{ghdw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYFW = #{jyfw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYXZ = #{jyxz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYYT = #{jyyt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZL = #{zl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZRQ = #{bzrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GXRQ = #{gxrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NSRQ =#{nsrq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZYJY = #{zyjy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YCXT = #{ycxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XTNXS = #{xtnxs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZRQ0 = #{zzrq0, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZRQ1 =#{zzrq1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZFQ = #{xzfq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL1 = #{ext_col1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL2 = #{ext_col2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL3 = #{ext_col3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL4 = #{ext_col4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL5 = #{ext_col5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL6 = #{ext_col6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL7 = #{ext_col7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL8 = #{ext_col8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL9 = #{ext_col9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL10 = #{ext_col10, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE XKZHM = #{xkzhm}
